title: Do not ban Rakan and Xayah in normals
body: You are ultimatly wasting a ban that could be used on Yasuo or Lee Sin. Rak/Xay have like a sub 50% win rate, so it's not like they are game breaking right now, don't be assholes and ban someones fun.

replies.body: Theyre not even ban worthy. Ive played against both and they seem ok.
Exactly, let people have fun with the duo champions.
